text: It s really sad how lonely being suicidal isLike  you can t talk to anyone   And if you can  it s like maybe one or two people  Half of them are probably your medical team  who check in with you once or twice a week  and are paid to care about you   You know all your  family and friends care  but it s impossible to talk to them  You don t want them to overreact  You don t want them to worry   You can t hang out with your friends anymore because you have nothing positive or noteworthy to say  No one wants to go to dinner or to a bar and hear about how you hate living  You don t want to bring the mood down all the time   And the one person you trust to talk to can t handle all of your stress  You can t rely on just that person  It takes a toll on them and stresses them out too  so now you start censoring yourself and feel like you can t tell them everything   And then you re just stuck with your thoughts in your head  Wondering what s the best thing to do   And then there s the planning   What to write in your note saying goodbye  What to do with your dog  How to leave your apartment  What date to set   I just wish euthanasia was legal so I could die with my friends and family by my side  I wish I could talk freely about my thoughts and plans  and have support in my decision  I wish someone could be by my side in my last moments   But no  I have to do this alone  And it s so lonely   I m not afraid of dying  I m slowly learning to not be afraid if I fail trying to die  and die suffering slowly and painfully  I just wish I wasn t lonely through it all  I wish someone could hold my hand and hug me before I go
summary: It's lonely being suicidal. You can't talk to anyone. You don't want to bring the mood down all the time. The one person you trust to talk to can't handle all of your stress. You start censoring yourself and feel like you can't tell them everything. Then you're stuck with your thoughts and wondering what's the best thing to do.
cleaned: lonely suicidal not talk not want bring mood time person trust talk not handle stress start censor feel like not tell stick thought wonder good thing
